A reason (to be stored-on-chain) as to w: 申请小费的原因（链式存储）。
Allocate a suggested tip amount. With en: 分配建议的小费金额。 有了足够的认可，将发送给受益人建议值的中位数。
As a council member, you can suggest an: As a council member, you can suggest an initial value for the tip, each other council member can suggest their own.
Multiple council proposals could exist,: Multiple council proposals could exist, both approval and rejection. Apply your vote to the correct council proposal (also available on council motions page)
Of the beneficiary amount, at least {{bo: Of the beneficiary amount, at least {{bondPercentage}} would need to be put up as collateral. The maximum of this and the minimum bond will be used to secure the proposal, refundable if it passes.
Proposal can either be to approve or rej: Proposal can either be to approve or reject this spend. One approved, the change is applied by either removing the proposal or scheduling payout.
Select the account you wish to close fro: Select the account you wish to close from.
Select the account you wish to submit th: Select the account you wish to submit the proposal from.
Select the account you wish to submit the tip from.
Select the council account you wish to u: Select the council account you wish to use to make the proposal.
The account to which the proposed balanc: The account to which the proposed balance will be transferred if approved
The account to which the tip will be tra: The account to which the tip will be transferred if approved
The amount of KTON that will be allocate: The amount of KTON that will be allocated from the treasury pot
The amount of RING that will be allocate: The amount of RING that will be allocated from the treasury pot
The amount that will be allocated from t: The amount that will be allocated from the treasury pot
The beneficiary will receive the full am: The beneficiary will receive the full amount if the proposal passes.
The beneficiary will received the tip as: The beneficiary will received the tip as approved by council members.
The council member that is proposing thi: The council member that is proposing this, submission equates to an "aye" vote.
The council proposal to make the vote on: The council proposal to make the vote on
The hash for the proposal this vote appl: The hash for the proposal this vote applies to
The minimum amount that will be bonded: The minimum amount that will be bonded
The on-chain percentage for the treasury: The on-chain percentage for the treasury
The reason why this tip should be paid.
The suggested value for this tip: The suggested value for this tip
The tip amount that should be allocated: The tip amount that should be allocated
The type of council proposal to submit.
The value is the amount that is being as: The value is the amount that is being asked for and that will be allocated to the beneficiary if the proposal is approved.
This account will make the proposal and: This account will make the proposal and be responsible for the bond.
Use this account to request the tip from: Use this account to request the tip from. This can be a normal or council account.
Your close will be applied for this coun: Your close will be applied for this council account.
Your endorsement will be applied for thi: Your endorsement will be applied for this account.
